name: DMP - Metadata management for original music publishers
description: When you fill out the following form and submit, the software will be installed and deployed from the repository. By doing so, you accept the license from: https://github.com/matijakolaric-com/django-music-publisher/blob/master/LICENSE

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py loaddata publishing_staff.json|python manage.py createsuperuser --noinput --skip-checks

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME.description: Username for the administrator, used only for installation

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD.description: Password for the administrator, used only during installation

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL.description: Email address for the administrator, used only during installation

SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key, used for security, let it be autogenerated.

PUBLISHER.description:
The name of your publishing entity.
Do NOT use comma in the name.

PUBLISHER_CODE.description:
The code required for CWR delivery, get it from your society. 
Without it, CWR export will not work, but you can add it later.

PUBLISHER_IPI_NAME.description: Publisher 11-digit IPI name number, get it from your society (PRO, collecting organization).

PUBLISHER_IPI_BASE.description: Publisher IPI base number. Rarely used.

PUBLISHER_SOCIETY_PR.description:
Numerical performance society code, ask your society (PRO, collecting organization) for the value.
Do NOT enter leading zeros.

PUBLISHER_SOCIETY_MR.description:
Numerical mechanical society code, ask your society (MRO, collecting organization) for the value.
Do NOT enter leading zeros.

PUBLISHER_SOCIETY_SR.description: Numerical synchronization society code, rarely used and only for production music blanket licencing.

REQUIRE_SAAN.description:
Enter '1' to make Society-Assigned Agreement Number a required field.
Required in some societies, e.g. PRS/MCPS, BUMA/STEMRA, GEMA.

REQUIRE_PUBLISHER_FEE.description: Enter '1' to make Publisher Fee a required field. If unsure, leave it empty.

PUBLISHING_AGREEMENT_PUBLISHER_PR.description: Performance share transferred from a controlled writer to the publisher

PUBLISHING_AGREEMENT_PUBLISHER_MR.description: Mechanical share transferred from a controlled writer to the publisher

PUBLISHING_AGREEMENT_PUBLISHER_SR.description: Synchronization share transferred from a controlled writer to the publisher
